sentences.en: William was angered and embarrassed by his oversight.
sentences.cn: 威廉对自己的疏忽感到恼火和尴尬。

sentences.en: The bill creates an oversight board with the authority to investigate and punish accounting firms.
sentences.cn: 该法案创建了一个有权调查并处罚会计师事务所的监督委员会。

sentences.en: Assisted migration really needs this level of oversight, and soon.
sentences.cn: 辅助迁移确实需要这个层次的监督，而且是急需。
